Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell combined cooling, heating, and power system integrating biomass gasification is proposed.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The hybrid system consists of the biomass gasifier, solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine, and waste heat recovery device.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The system can be divided into different configurations by adjusting the valve opening to change the waste heat mode.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The thermodynamic model is established and validated; the system evaluation indicators and the thermodynamic, economic and environmental performance are researched under design conditions.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The influences of several crucial parameters on syngas composition and system performance under the different configurations are investigated.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This paper also evaluates the scope of system regulation and energy output to meet the energy demand side.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The analysis results indicate that system power efficiency is 58.92% at the preferred configuration, and the system energy and exergy efficiency can attain 86.70% and 50.45%.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The system total cost rate and the CO2 emission rate are relatively lower, at 19.6$/h and 0.4722kg/kWh.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: By implementing different configuration strategies, the system exergy efficiency is between 46.55% and 50.45%.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The system heating to power ratio and cooling to power ratio can vary from 0 to 0.58 and 0 to 0.77.
Titulo: Regulation strategies and thermodynamic analysis of combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated with biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell
